projects.title: Conversational Interface For Weather
projects.description: Dissertation Project. A mobile app along with a webserver to facilitate communication with a LLM for real weather information, a conversational method for information delivery.

projects.title: This Website!
projects.description: This website was created not only to showcase my skills but to learn and practice with react and bun.

projects.description: An Expo mobile app for creating tasks, and upon complete receiving points and motivational messages.

projects.description: To learn the basics for react-native and Expo we were with redesigning a trail finding.

projects.title: Prototype Web-Store
projects.description: A prototype web store using flask.

projects.title: Weather Data Entry Site
projects.description: A simple flask web site for entering weather data. Was part of my university teaching to learn javascript and flask.

projects.title: Stocks Trading Simulator
projects.description: My A-Level project using tkinter, it gathers real data relating to stocks to allow the simulated buying and selling of these stocks.

Projects.title: Silhouette
Projects.description: For my final year of A-level Media Studies my team and I were tasked with producing a trailer for a horror film. I was in the position of director of cinematography as well the camera operator.

Projects.title: Duty Calls
Projects.description: In first year Media Studies A-level we were assigned to produce the first 2 minutes of a film. For this assignment I was a co-director and camera operator.

Projects.title: Finest Day
Projects.description: For this assignment we were tasked with conveying native through a table top and objects.

Projects.title: The Deal
Projects.description: In this simple video we were experimenting with camera angles and shots.

projects.title: Personal Creations
projects.description: These are designs I have made for my personal enjoyment along with practicing my skills.

name: About Me
bio: I am a student currently awaiting my dissertation results from Bournemouth University. I am experienced in various programming languages, and keen to learn more. Currently, I am teaching myself Rust to explore the memory safety and performance offered. It is a unique learning experience as most of my programming has been in high-level languages, but ultimately I'm finding the challenge an enjoyable and engaging aspect of the learning process.

I am also interested in areas outside of software engineering. I have a strong passion for media creation, such as film production, graphic design and photography. I also enjoy travelling and exploring the world and am not one to shy away from physical tasks and getting out of my comfort zone.
